com.superduckinvaders.game

Class Round

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.Round

  • public final class Round
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a round of the game played on one level with a single objective.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean bossFlag
      Boolean representing whether or not a boss has already been spawned.
      private java.util.List<Entity> entities
      Array of all entities currently in the Round.
      static boolean isSwimming
      Boolean indicating if the player is swimming or not (in water).
      private com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map
      The Round's map.
      private int mobCount
      A counter representing the total number of mobs in the round.
      private static int NUMBER_OF_MOBS
      Total number of mobs to spawn at start of round
      private Objective objective
      The current objective.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer obstaclesLayer
      Map layer containing randomly-chosen layer of predefined obstacles.
      private DuckGame parent
      The GameTest instance this Round belongs to.
      private Player player
      The player.
      private static double RANGED_MOB_SPAWNRATE
      Double indicating the chance of spawning a ranged mob.
      private boolean testPowerups
      Boolean indicating whether or not to spawn testing powerups next to player at start of round.
      static int UPDATE_DISTANCE
      How near entities must be to the player to get updated in the game loop.

    • Method Detail

      • spawnPlayer

        private void spawnPlayer(boolean testing)
        Handles the spawning of the player. Retrieves spawn point location from map file, defaults to (0, 0). Also spawns testing powerups next to player depending on boolean parameter value.
        Parameters:
        testing - spawn testing powerups (yes/no).

      • spawnTestingPowerups

        private void spawnTestingPowerups(int playerSpawnX,
                                  int playerSpawnY)
        Spawns one of each powerup next to player spawn point for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        playerSpawnX - player spawn point x coord.
        playerSpawnY - player spawn point y coord.

      • chooseObstacles

        private com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer chooseObstacles()
        Randomly selects and returns a set of predefined obstacles from the map.
        Returns:
        the map layer containing the obstacles

      • spawnRandomMobs

        private void spawnRandomMobs(int amount,
                             int minX,
                             int minY,
                             int maxX,
                             int maxY)
        Spawns a number of random mobs the specified distance from the player.
        Parameters:
        amount - how many random mobs to spawn
        minX - the minimum x distance from the player to spawn the mobs
        minY - the minimum y distance from the player to spawn the mobs
        maxX - the maximum x distance from the player to spawn the mobs
        maxY - the maximum y distance from the player to spawn the mobs

      • createProjectile

        public void createProjectile(double x,
                             double y,
                             double targetX,
                             double targetY,
                             double speed,
                             double velocityXOffset,
                             double velocityYOffset,
                             int damage,
                             Entity owner)
        Creates a new projectile and adds it to the list of entities.
        Parameters:
        x - the initial x coordinate
        y - the initial y coordinate
        targetX - the target x coordinate
        targetY - the target y coordinate
        speed - how fast the projectile moves
        velocityXOffset - the offset to the initial X velocity
        velocityYOffset - the offset to the initial Y velocity
        damage - how much damage the projectile deals
        owner - the owner of the projectile (i.e. the one who fired it)

      • createParticle

        public void createParticle(double x,
                           double y,
                           double duration,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation animation)
        Creates a new particle effect and adds it to the list of entities.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the center of the particle effect
        y - the y coordinate of the center of the particle effect
        duration - how long the particle effect should last for
        animation - the animation to use for the particle effect

      • createPowerup

        public void createPowerup(double x,
                          double y,
                          Player.Powerup powerup)
        Creates a powerup on the floor and adds it to the list of entities.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the powerup
        y - the y coordinate of the powerup
        powerup - the powerup to grant to the player
        time - how long the powerup should last for

      • createUpgrade

        public void createUpgrade(double x,
                          double y,
                          Player.Upgrade upgrade)
        Creates an upgrade on the floor and adds it to the list of entities.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the upgrade
        y - the y coordinate of the upgrade
        upgrade - the upgrade to grant to the player

      • createMob

        public boolean createMob(double x,
                         double y,
                         int health,
                         TextureSet textureSet,
                         int speed)
        Creates a mob and adds it to the list of entities, but only if it doesn't intersect with another character.
        Parameters:
        x - the initial x coordinate
        y - the initial y coordinate
        health - the initial health of the mob
        textureSet - the texture set to use
        speed - how fast the mob moves in pixels per second
        Returns:
        true if the mob was successfully added, false if there was an intersection and the mob wasn't added

      • createBoss

        private boolean createBoss(double x,
                           double y,
                           int health,
                           TextureSet textureSet,
                           int speed)
        Creates a boss mob at the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - the initial x coordinate
        y - the initial y coordinate
        health - the initial health of the mob
        textureSet - the texture set to use
        speed - how fast the mob moves in pixels per second
        Returns:
        true if the mob was successfully added, false if there was an intersection and the mob wasn't added

      • spawnRandomBoss

        private boolean spawnRandomBoss(int attempts,
                                int minX,
                                int minY,
                                int maxX,
                                int maxY)
        Spawns a boss mob at a randomly chosen (within a range) distance from the player.
        Parameters:
        attempts - how many times to attempt spawning the boss randomly.
        minX - the minimum x distance from the player to spawn the mob.
        minY - the minimum y distance from the player to spawn the mob.
        maxX - the maximum x distance from the player to spawn the mob.
        maxY - the maximum y distance from the player to spawn the mob.
        Returns:
        true if the boss was successfully spawned in the given number of attempts.

      • updateEntities

        private void updateEntities(float delta)

      • updateObjective

        private void updateObjective(float delta)

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Handles updating of all round specific objects.
        Parameters:
        delta - the time elapsed since the last update
